summary: Forward truth lemma cannot be established via ultrafilter extensions due to categorical mismatch between point-based (ultrafilter/MCS) and path-based (history) semantics for Box. The gap is mathematical, not proof-technical. Recommend accepting semantic_weak_completeness as primary completeness theorem.

artifacts.summary: Analyzes ultrafilter extension approaches for forward truth lemma, concluding the gap is categorical and cannot be bridged without semantic changes
